frontmatter.title: Log Streaming

internal.content:
---
title: Log Streaming
description: How does Log Streaming work & how to leverage it
keywords: 'ibm cloud'
---

<PageDescription>

What is Event Streams? 

</PageDescription>

<InlineNotification>

###### Event Streams 

Event Streams allows you to stream your logDNA content to a queue, which you can then connect to any external application such as Splunk.

</InlineNotification>

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: Log Streaming
description: How does Log Streaming work & how to leverage it
keywords: 'ibm cloud'
---

<PageDescription>

What is Event Streams? 

</PageDescription>

<InlineNotification>

###### Event Streams 

Event Streams allows you to stream your logDNA content to a queue, which you can then connect to any external application such as Splunk.

</InlineNotification>
